metadata.name: The Phantom and Yuri
metadata.description:
The Phantom and Yuri

This is an illustration I drew to be used in the marketing for an upcoming pfp mint collaboration between NeoTokyo and NANOPASS. 

Both projects are metaverse projects and have cyberpunk themes making this a fun collaboration to imagine. 

My idea is they are both fighting the UAEC to prevent the destruction/corruption of the metaverse, and protect the citizens of the last place safe from the collapsing world.
